title: Biden’s Ukraine Tapes | Guests: Dinesh D’Souza & Adam Carolla | 9/18/20
description:
President Trump took a stand against Marxism being taught in our schools with his "1776 Commission," but the media called his speech “racially divisive” for targeting the 1619 Project. Big tech is shadow-banning a recently leaked conversation between Joe Biden and Ukraine’s former president. Dinesh D’Souza joins on the release date of his first feature film, "Infidel," a political thriller that confronts radical Islam, starring Jim Caviezel. Nashville officials were caught hiding coronavirus data on bars and restaurants. The Minneapolis City Council is wondering where the police are as crime rises. Something’s seriously wrong with the CDC. Comedian Adam Carolla discusses how Facebook tried to cancel yesterday’s “CancelCon” event.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
